headline: Syensqo - Participation notification by BlackRock Inc.
summary: Press releaseCommuniqué de pressePersbericht Regulated Participation notification by BlackRock Inc. Brussels, Belgium – February 04, 2026 - 08:30 CET According to Belgian transparency legislation (Law of May 2, 2007), BlackRock Inc. (12 Throgmorton Avenue, London EC2N 2DL, UK) recently sent Syensqo the following transparency notifications indicating that it crossed the threshold of 3%. Here is the summary of the moves: Date on which the threshold was crossedVoting rights after the transactionEqu
